```{r}
upload_count <- function(data) {
  data_counts <- dplyr::count(data, created_by, name = "Uploaded")

  data_counts |>
    dplyr::add_row(created_by = "Total", Uploaded = sum(data_counts$Uploaded)) |>
    knitr::kable(col.names = c("User", "Uploaded"), align = "r")
}
```
